Package controller

Class SessionController

java.lang.Object
controller.SessionController
public class SessionController extends Object
This class represents the session controller. It manages the sending and receive of TCP messages. It allows to have a static attribute of the session using the application. It also manages the list of all the sessions.

  • Constructor Details

    • SessionController

      public SessionController()
      Constructor

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public static void initialize()
      This method initializes the session controller. It creates a new TCP listener. It creates a new sessions list. It starts the TCP listener.

    • createSession

      public static void createSession​(User userDist)
      Create a new TCP session with the other user. It adds the session to the sessions list. Called by the main frame controller when a user is selected.
      Parameters:
      userDist - , the other user

    • sessionCreated

      public static void sessionCreated​(Socket link)
      This method is called when a new session is created with us by another user. Called by the TCPListener class.
      Parameters:
      link - , the socket of the new session

    • sendMessage

      public static void sendMessage​(Message message, User userDist)
      This method is called when a message is received. It calls the method to add the message to the database. It calls the method to update the chat pane.
      Parameters:
      message - , the message received
      userDist - , the user who will receive the message

    • getSessionWithUser

      public static TCPSession getSessionWithUser​(User userDist)
      This method is used to get the Session object corresponding to the user.
      Parameters:
      userDist - , the user
      Returns:
      the session object

    • getSessionWithAddress

      public static TCPSession getSessionWithAddress​(String ipString)
      This method is used to get the Session object corresponding to the IP address of a user.
      Parameters:
      ipString - , the IP address of the user
      Returns:
      the session object

    • getSessionWithPseudo

      public static TCPSession getSessionWithPseudo​(String pseudo)
      This method is used to get the Session object corresponding to the pseudo of a user.
      Parameters:
      pseudo - , the pseudo of the user
      Returns:
      the session object

    • isSessionWith

      public static boolean isSessionWith​(User userDist)
      This method check if a session is already created with the user.
      Parameters:
      userDist - , the user
      Returns:
      true if the session is already created, false otherwise

    • closeSession

      public static void closeSession​(TCPSession session)
      This method is used to close a session. It calls the method to close the socket. It removes the session from the sessions list.
      Parameters:
      session - , the session to close

    • closeSession

      public static void closeSession​(User userDist)
      This method is used to close a session. It get the session corresponding to the user. It calls the method to close the socket. It removes the session from the sessions list.
      Parameters:
      userDist - , the user

    • closeAllSessions

      public static void closeAllSessions()
      This method is used to close all the sessions. It loops on the sessions list and calls the method to close the socket. It clears the sessions list.

    • close

      public static void close()
      This method is used to close the TCP listener. It calls the method to close all the sessions It calls the method to close the TCP listener.
